messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1829~
messages.msgSnippet: I Feel unschooling means non-formal, As John Holt used it. I am non-formal in my typing~ i dont use caps or apostrophes~ I KNOW the grammar but i choose to
messages.messageBody:
I Feel "unschooling" means non-formal, As John Holt used it. I am non-formal
in my typing~ i dont use caps or apostrophes~ I KNOW the grammar but i choose
to let it go on the net..to type faster and let my anal tendencies Go FREE as
the wind.. I express myself better when im free~ SO lets just let this all go
and be who we are......wodnerful parents of wonderful children who need
guidance becasue they dont have the epxerience of our years of life. Mostly
they need their birthrights: safety, health and love. You are spending a lot
of time justifying what you are all doing here.....I'm trying to hang in here
as a group~ not enjoying myslef.... i know its my choice not to read the
email but im new and i dont want to judge too quickly. ~Denise (foster mom to
31 kids and adopted 3)
